traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. he can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. he is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: Timmy is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. he never insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around him. he also never judges people by their appearance. his agreeableness also makes him more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.
traits.name: kind

traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother him at all. he doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects him. he also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, he tried it... and he liked it.
traits.name: cannibal

traits.description: Timmy always says exactly what's on his mind, especially if it's bugging him. That tends to rub people the wrong way.
traits.name: abrasive

traits.description: Timmy is too smart for his own good. he learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: toosmart

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. his accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but he'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. he doesn't know why, he's just wired differently.
traits.name: masochist

traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

he gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

he doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nightowl

traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. he gets a mood loss if he doesn't get what he wants.
traits.name: greedy

traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. he gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
traits.name: jealous

traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. he will become unhappy if he has a bedroom that's too impressive. he also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. he never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: ascetic

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of his own gender.
traits.name: gay

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to both men and women.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: Timmy has no sexual attraction to anyone at all.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and he tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike him.
traits.name: annoyingvoice

traits.description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
traits.name: creepybreathing

traits.description: Timmy loves fire. he will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, he will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if his mood is low.
traits.name: pyromaniac

traits.description: Timmy is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize him.
traits.name: wimp

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: Timmy is slow on the uptake. he learns much slower than others.
traits.name: slowlearner

traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. he will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long he stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.
traits.name: undergrounder

traits.description: Timmy feels limited in his feeble human body. he often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.
traits.name: bodymodder

traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To him, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: bodypurist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.
traits.name: misandrist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.
traits.name: misogynist

traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. he will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.
traits.name: greatmemory

traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. he takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. he is extremely hard to kill.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. he will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.
traits.name: torturedartist

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. he gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.
traits.name: gourmand

traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether he's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, he will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: quicksleeper

traits.description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever he goes anywhere.
traits.name: slowpoke

traits.description: Timmy likes to be where he's going. he walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: fastwalker

traits.description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
traits.name: jogger

traits.description: Timmy is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalfascination

traits.description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. he will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalinterest

traits.description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. he strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.name: teetotaler

traits.description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about his situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: sanguine

traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get him down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.
traits.name: pessimist

traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. he has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
traits.name: depressive

traits.description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. he keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
traits.name: iron-willed

traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: steadfast

traits.description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.
traits.name: nervous

traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. he is the first to break in any tough situation.
traits.name: volatile

traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. he will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can get the better of him.
traits.name: neurotic

traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. he will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but his nerves can easily get the better of him.
traits.name: veryneurotic

traits.description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
traits.name: industrious

traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hardworker

traits.description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.
traits.name: lazy

traits.description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. he moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
traits.name: slothful

traits.description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. he is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallyhypersensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallysensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. he isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydull

traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. he just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydeaf

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. he shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: carefulshooter

traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. he shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
traits.name: trigger-happy

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to him before he even opens his mouth.
traits.name: beautiful

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like him.
traits.name: pretty

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.
traits.name: ugly

traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. his face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at him while conversing.
traits.name: staggeringlyugly

traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. he will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immune

traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. he gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: sickly

traits.description: Timmy hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
traits.name: xenophobe

traits.description: Timmy thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
traits.name: xenophile

traits.description: Either the body or mind of Timmy is one of insight and experience. While some find them old fashioned, others will respect their guidance.

data.mod: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures

traits.name: elder

traits.description: A strict principle of nonviolence which applies to all living things.
traits.name: vowofnonviolence

traits.description: Timmy is always ready to learn new things.
traits.name: fastlearner

traits.description: Timmy is averse to change or innovation, preferring to hold traditional values.
traits.name: conservative

traits.description: Timmy is an expert when it comes to economics. They prefer to spend more time trading and less time working though.
traits.name: mercantile

traits.description: Timmy is very fit and can easily move at fast speeds.
traits.name: athletic

traits.description: Some people see great value and potential in Timmy.
traits.name: valuable

traits.description: Some people see little value and potential in Timmy.
traits.name: worthless

traits.description: Timmy has lots of past combat experience, though this means that they are a bit on edge.
traits.name: experiencedcombatant

traits.description: Timmy isn't exactly an accurate shooter and tends to miss the shot.
traits.name: badshot

traits.description: Timmy is a natural when it comes to shooting.
traits.name: sniper

traits.description: Timmy is a pure, rare genius.
traits.name: genius

traits.description: Timmy is smarter than the average Joe.
traits.name: intelligent

traits.description: Timmy is not the brightest in the bunch and has less brain power.
traits.name: unintelligent

traits.description: Timmy lacks when it comes to brain power but is oblivious to psycic disruption.
traits.name: brainless

traits.description: Timmy has inferior strengh compared to others.
traits.name: weak

traits.description: Timmy is a living tank and can take on most opponents with ease.
traits.name: indestructable

traits.description: Timmy just can't get enough from hurting people, he is six times more likely to get into a social fight than others .
traits.name: violent

traits.description: Timmy has unbelievable kinesthetic intelligence. he seems to dance elegantly around danger with not a single worry.
traits.name: verynimble

traits.description: Timmy doesn't like to eat a lot of food. However, they are not themselves when they are hungry.
traits.name: pickyeater

traits.description: Timmy doesn't get as much sleep as others and needs to rest much longer.
traits.name: insomnia

traits.description: Timmy is forgetful and will lose unused skills much faster than others.
traits.name: forgetful

traits.description: Timmy has been selected by nature to be more durable.Timmy's genes have evolved above everyone elses.
traits.name: naturallyselected

traits.description: Timmy has been selected by a higher being to become more powerful.
traits.name: chosen

traits.description: Timmy is truly God-Like, and extremely valuable. If you have one of these colonists, look after them well, I mean it. If you don't bad luck. This trait has a 1.5% chance.
traits.name: god-like

traits.description: Timmy has a healthy immune system. This means that they have a better chance at surviving diseases.
traits.name: healthy

traits.description: Timmy has an unhealthy immune system. This means they are more likely to suffer from diseases.
traits.name: unhealthy

traits.description: Timmy hates the sight of the human body. he will be extremely unhappy when naked, more displeased than usual in tattered or worn-out clothing, and dislike the sight of other naked people.
traits.name: prude

traits.description: Timmy finds it difficult to sleep because of his condition. he will prioritize sleep less, wake up sooner, and get less rest from sleeping.
traits.name: insomniac

traits.description: Timmy has a big heart and gets very emotional. he loves helping people, and abhors violence and injustice. he is more affected by these things than others.
traits.name: bleedingheart

traits.description: Timmy is always a critic when it comes to food. he expects to be fed well and will complain if his meals aren't up to par.
traits.name: gourmet

traits.description: Timmy is more prone to random mood swings, which can be more severe than normal for others.
traits.name: unstable

traits.description: Timmy is unabashedly lecherous and a thoughtless heartbreaker. he will hit on anyone he desires with no regard for the consequences.
traits.name: lecher

traits.description: Timmy is romantically needy and won't be happy unless in a relationship. he will be devastated by infidelity and breakups.
traits.name: codependent

traits.description: Timmy loves to be outside. he gets a mood bonus when there is no roof over his head.
traits.name: outdoorsy

traits.description: Timmy likes the rain. he gets a mood bonus when it's pouring outside, especially if he gets to go out in it.
traits.name: pluviophile

traits.description: Timmy has eyes, either through gene modding or random mutation, that are extremely light-sensitive. he finds bright light extremely painful and indoor lighting bothersome, and will be happiest in the dark.
traits.name: photosensitive

traits.description: Timmy loves to party! his mere presence inspires more parties in the colony, because everyone enjoys partying with him.
traits.name: socialite

traits.description: Timmy has seen enough violence and death that it no longer shocks him like it used to.
traits.name: desensitized

traits.description: Timmy sleeps like a rock, never bothered by adverse sleeping conditions, but is difficult to wake up.
traits.name: heavysleeper

traits.description: Timmy doesn't see any problem with having multiple partners. he doesn't mind if his partner romances other people, but will be less happy in a restraining, monogamous relationship.
traits.name: polyamorous

traits.description: Timmy sees people for what they are on the inside, not the outside. he doesn't judge others for their appearances.
traits.name: open-minded

traits.description: Timmy isn't a very active person. he isn't very physically fit, but he enjoys sitting around all day working on things.
traits.name: sedentary

traits.description: Timmy just talks and talks and talks... and talks. he tends to have longer conversations than most, because he can't seem to end them.
traits.name: chatty

traits.description: Timmy has a strong back which allows him to carry more than most people.
traits.name: strongback

traits.description: Timmy has a very strong back, he must be part mule or something because he can carry a lot more than most people.
traits.name: verystrongback

traits.description: Timmy has a charismatic personality. he is good at social interactions and trading.
traits.name: charismatic

traits.description: Timmy has a very charismatic personality. he is great at social interactions and trading.
traits.name: verycharismatic

traits.description: Timmy has an intimidating personality, this gives him an advantage in social interactions.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: intimidating

traits.description: Timmy has a very intimidating personality, this gives him a large advantage in social interactions.
stats: +20% per day slave suppression fall rate
+20% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: veryintimidating

traits.description: Timmy has poor hand-eye coordination and will miss his target more often in combat.
traits.name: pooraim

traits.description: Timmy has good hand-eye coordination and will miss his target less often in combat.
traits.name: steadyaim

traits.description: Timmy has great hand-eye coordination and will miss his target less often in combat.
traits.name: greataim

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled crafter with artistic finesse, he enjoys putting things together and he's pretty good at it.
traits.name: artisan

traits.description: Timmy has an iron stomach. he can go without eating longer and it takes more to upset his stomach.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: ironstomach

traits.description: Timmy packs lightly. he will carry less but will move more swiftly.
traits.name: packin'light

traits.description: Timmy is a pack rat, he will keep just about anything that might be useful later.
traits.name: packrat

traits.description: Timmy has good reflexes and moves with finesse. he will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
traits.name: agile

traits.description: Timmy has great reflexes and moves like a ninja. he will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
traits.name: ninja

traits.description: Timmy is more intelligent than average. he learns faster and has a good understanding of the world around him.
traits.name: intelligent

traits.description: Timmy is very intelligent. he learns faster and has a great understanding of the world around him.
traits.name: veryintelligent

traits.description: Timmy is aware of his surroundings and has a good understanding of how his actions affects others.
traits.name: perceptive

traits.description: Timmy is very aware of his surroundings and has a great understanding of how his actions affects others.
traits.name: veryperceptive

traits.description: Timmy is good at doging things. he is good at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.
traits.name: dodgy

traits.description: Timmy is great at evading things. he is great at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.
traits.name: evasive

traits.description: Timmy is great at traveling. he moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: traveler

traits.description: Timmy is great at exploration. he moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: explorer

traits.description: Timmy is great at adventuring. he moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: adventurer

traits.description: Timmy is a bandolier. he likes to keep extra ammo handy for reloading ranged weapons.
traits.name: bandolier

traits.description: Timmy has a scientific mind. he is a good researcher and a fast learner.
traits.name: scientific

traits.description: Timmy has a very scientific mind. he is a great researcher and a fast learner.
traits.name: veryscientific

traits.description: Timmy has good health and an enduring personality. he is better at handling stressful situations than others.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: enduring

traits.description: Timmy has exceptional health and a very enduring personality. he is capable of handling high stress situations that others cannot.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: veryenduring

traits.description: Timmy is great at bargaining. he is great at social interactions and can find great deals while trading.
traits.name: bargainer

traits.description: Timmy is a hard bargainer. he is adept at social interactions and can find the best deals while trading.
traits.name: hardbargainer

traits.description: Timmy has an uninspiring personality. he has less motivation to learn and puts less effort into social interactions.
stats: -10% per day slave suppression fall rate
-10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: uninspiring

traits.description: Timmy has an inspirational personality. he is good at social interactions and is a motivated learner .
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: inspirational

traits.description: Timmy has a very inspirational personality. he is great at social interactions and is a very motivated learner.
stats: +20% per day slave suppression fall rate
+20% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: veryinspirational

traits.description: Timmy is a generous person, sometimes to a fault. he is a good negotiator but often does so by offering more than he should.
traits.name: generous

traits.description: Timmy is an overly generous person to a fault. he is a great negotiator but often does so by offering more than he should
traits.name: overlygenerous

traits.description: Timmy is good at working with scrap metal. he is great with a smelter and is efficient when using building materials.
traits.name: scrapper

traits.description: Timmy is a natural leader, he is good at social interactions and can handle stressful situations that others might not.
stats: +20% per day slave suppression fall rate
+20% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: naturalleader

traits.description: Timmy's body has built up a resistance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
traits.name: radresistant

traits.description: Timmy's body has built up a tolerance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
traits.name: radtolerant

traits.description: There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.
traits.name: actionboy

traits.description: There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.
traits.name: actiongirl

traits.description: Timmy has quick hands. When it comes to his hands, Timmy never hesitates.
traits.name: quickhands

traits.description: Timmy is a gun nut, he loves guns so much that he gets a mood boost while holding a ranged weapon.
traits.name: gunnut

traits.description: Timmy knows how to scavenge and gather for resources quickly, but if you think that's fast wait until you see he eat!
traits.name: scrounger

traits.description: Timmy has a sturdy frame. he can carry more and it takes more to bring him down.
traits.name: sturdyframe

traits.description: Timmy is survialist. he has a natural ability to survive some situations that others might not.
traits.name: survivalist

traits.description: Timmy finds the gap to make the tackle! he moves quickly and gets the jobs done before anyone can react.
traits.name: blitz

traits.description: Timmy is a philanthropist. he is generally good natured and cares for the welfare of others.
traits.name: philanthropist

traits.description: Timmy has healing hands. Whether it's for patching up or food the colony knows they can count on his healing touch.
traits.name: healinghands

traits.description: Timmy is part tree! It takes more to bring Timmy down but also more to get him moving.
stats: +20% per day slave suppression fall rate
+20% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: rooted

traits.description: Timmy has a lead belly. his belly can go much longer without food and he is more resistant to toxic radiation.
traits.name: leadbelly

traits.description: Timmy has bear arms. he can carry more and his arms pack more of a punch!
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: beararms

traits.description: Timmy is serendipitous, he seems to be a pretty lucky individual and he's pretty happy about it too.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: serendipitous

traits.description: Timmy has a passion for gardening. he is quick when working with plants and recieves more bountiful yields when harvesting them.
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: Timmy is a tenderizer! he has a passion for beating meat into submission.
traits.name: tenderizer

traits.description: Timmy seems to discover hidden wealth where ever he goes.
traits.name: fortunefinder

traits.description: Timmy is a bountiful butcher! he isn't afraid to dig a little deeper to get what he wants.
traits.name: bountifulbutcher

traits.description: Timmy has a passion for animals. he is adept at animal interactions and will bond with them more often. Timmy refuses to hunt animals.
traits.name: animalfriend

traits.description: Timmy has a magnetic body, literally! Somehow he able to use his attractiveness on not just colonists, but metals too!.
traits.name: magnetic

traits.description: Timmy embodies wellness! Colonist who need treatment can rest easily knowing they have his's expertise keeping them alive.
traits.name: lifegiver

traits.description: Timmy is a spiritual healer, he is a great doctor with good social skills. Timmy loves to grow and make his own medicine.
traits.name: spiritualhealer

traits.description: Timmy has a frail back and won't be able to carry as much as the average person.
traits.name: frailback

traits.description: Timmy is still human, mostly. he is immune to the effects of toxic fallout and much harder to kill but his ghoulish appearance makes interacting with others difficult.
traits.name: ghoulish

traits.description: Timmy isn't stupid! he is just... different. he works through tasks slowly but learns extremely quickly. he is incapable performing intellectual, social or caring tasks.
traits.name: idiotsavant

traits.description: Timmy isn't very smart. he can mess up doing just about anything.
traits.name: stupid

traits.description: Timmy isn't very aware of his surroundings, or anything at all really. he
traits.name: oblivious

traits.description: Timmy is part woodchuck! he wants everyone to think his great woodworking skills are because of talent but everybody knows it's really because of those dang teeth.
traits.name: woodchucker

traits.description: Timmy is a wrecking ball! he can push through building material like it's not even there. he really doesn't know his own strength, often breaking things during construction.
traits.name: wreckingball

traits.description: Timmy is a perfectionist with a passion for art. he is great at construction but takes longer to complete tasks because he puts too much effort into making everything perfect.
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description: Timmy has an iron fist! he can punch through foes like they are not even there. Timmy has a passion for melee combat and dislikes ranged weapons.
traits.name: ironfist

traits.description: Timmy is abnormally receptive to the ebb and flow of mana, he will gain mana 40% faster than normal but his maximum mana capacity is reduced by 20.
traits.name: arcaneconduit

traits.description: Timmy has an increased resistance to the ebb and flow of mana which allows him to hold an additional 40 mana, but reduces his mana regeneration by 20%.
traits.name: manawell

traits.description: Timmy excels at combat arts and is able to execute combat maneuvers 40% more frequently, however, his talent has fostered an arrogant attitude that reduces his experience gain by 25% and causes other fighters to dislike him.
traits.name: boundless

traits.description: Timmy is a descendant of fae folk and has a natural connection to the arcane. his arcane resistance is reduced by 40% but mana regeneration and maximum mana is increased by 20%. Spell costs are reduced by 10%.
traits.name: faeblood

traits.description: Timmy is a descendant of giants - endowed with with great strength and stamina, though slow to recover. his max stamina is increased by 80%, but stamina regeneration is reduced by 40%. Any attack made while using a melee weapon, or unarmed, deals an additional 25% damage.
traits.name: giantsblood

traits.description: Timmy is blessed by magic, able to harness its power without suffering the full side-effects. Psychic sensitivity is increased by 50% and any magic ability used only incurs half the normal arcane weakness.
traits.name: enlightened

traits.description: Timmy is cursed by magic - tormented by the constant, burning rush of power through his being, and can only gain relief by expending arcane energy. Timmy will slowly accumulate arcane weakness up until he would become catatonic, and may become catatonic at any point while at this threshold. Using magical abilities that would normally incur arcane weakness will instead proportionally reduce arcane weakness, as well as the effects of the curse.
traits.name: cursed

traits.description: Timmy has accepted that death is another part of life and doesn't get upset when learning about a dead ally or seeing one of the undead.
traits.name: unaffectedbydeath

traits.description: Timmy has been reanimated as an undead.
traits.name: undead

traits.description: Timmy has a magical gift. he can harness this gift to become a mage by studying the mysterious secrets within an arcane script.
traits.name: magicallygifted

traits.description: Timmy is an empath, able to feel and manipulate the emotions of those around him. his's abilities are tied to magic, but have affected him on a more innate level. However, with training, Timmy can still become an adept magic user. For better or worse, empath's have a very strong presence and can easily read the presence of others; the effectiveness of their abilities are closely tied to their aptitude for overcoming another's defenses.
traits.name: empath

traits.description:
Timmy is a wanderer; an outcast, half-breed mage class frequently dubbed a hedge-mage. his carefree personality has kept his from developing class abilities. Instead, he has learned to improve on a vast number of utility abilities that allow him to adapt to any situation.
		
Wanderers prefer the open road and gain a mood boost for being in a caravan. Caravans with a wanderer will ignore the movement penalties of any world tile. However, their wanderlust will cause them to suffer a mood penalty for remaining at a colony for too long.
traits.name: wanderer

traits.description: Timmy is attuned with the elements of fire.
traits.name: firemage

traits.description: Timmy is attuned with the elements of water.
traits.name: icemage

traits.description: Timmy is attuned with the elements of lightning.
traits.name: lightningmage

traits.description: Timmy is attuned with arcane forces, interacting directly with raw arcane power to move matter and energy at will.
traits.name: arcanemage

traits.description: Timmy is attuned with the forces of nature.
traits.name: druid

traits.description: Timmy has been bestowed with divine might and has sworn to uphold justice wherever he stands.
traits.name: paladin

traits.description: Timmy is able to summon beings and materialize objects from other planes of existence.
traits.name: summoner

traits.description: Timmy is attuned with the forces of death.
traits.name: necromancer

traits.description: Timmy has transformed into a lich, forsaking life in exchange for an power and an immortal existence. he disdains menial taks, choosing to employ undead for trivial matters.
traits.name: lich

traits.description: Timmy is attuned with the forces of life and healing and has taken a vow against harming others.
traits.name: priest

traits.description: Timmy is a natural entertainer, able to lighten the mood and lift the spirits of everyone around him.
traits.name: entertainer

traits.description: Timmy is a performer; expanding on natural talent, he has begun to take an conscious role to improve the mood of other colonists.
traits.name: performer

traits.description: Everyone loves being around Timmy. he has talent, wit and skill in many forms of entertainment and is able to make a personal connection with almost everyone.
traits.name: minstrel

traits.description: Timmy is a master entertainer. Sharp wit, deft hands, and dry humor are his weapons, and he is a master of all his weapons.
traits.name: bard

traits.description: Timmy has a strange genetic strain that grants her enhanced physical attributes. She is also extremely attractive with an exotic facial structure that captures the eye. A succubus is more likely to exploit her physical advantages and have others do her work for her. his succubus charm has its disadvantages and can cause some to become jealous and even despise him.
traits.name: succubus

traits.description: Timmy is a Warlock - able to manifest physical and demonic forces using his unique access to arcane power. The warlock shares the same genetic mixture as a succubus, but as a male, he is affected with mental enhancements that include clairvoyance and telekineses. The warlock can occasionally affect the outcome of a social interaction using their mental capabilities, regardless of how the interaction actually occurred.
traits.name: warlock

traits.description: Timmy is attuned with the earth and natural order, drawing power from the physical realm and intertwining it with arcane energy. he is capable of reinforcing physical elements, and bending them, as he needs.
traits.name: geomancer

traits.description: Timmy has learned to see magic and science as two parts of the same force and is able to use arcane power to interface directly with components of technology. he is capable of manipulating objects with advanced mechanics, electronics, or computing it to achieve his goals, but has difficulty interacting with biological systems.
traits.name: technomancer

traits.description:
Timmy is a blood mage and has consigned to the dark art of manipulating the life blood of living things as a means of increasing his power.

As a blood mage, Timmy has learned to control the life force within and command it to his will. his connection to life makes it easier to associate with other living things, but doesn't appreciate effort without immediate results.
traits.name: bloodmage

traits.description: Timmy is an enchanter, attuned to the composition of matter and materials. he can manipulate matter to his will, frequently in unnatural ways, and his powers of transmutation can be permanent when sufficient effort is applied.
traits.name: enchanter

traits.description: Timmy is a chronomancer. Through arcane sight, he is able to view reality as it once was and as it could be, and can manipulate objects between those realities.
traits.name: chronomancer

traits.description: Timmy has rejected all predefined magic paths and refuses to attribute objective reality in his search for power; there are no truths, all magic is permitted. This tradition has enabled Timmy to learn any type of magic, although he will never master any.
traits.name: chaosmage

traits.description: Timmy is a half-breed demon with an affinity for shadow magic. he has developed his unique talents through combat training and physical conditioning making him the perfect assassin.
traits.name: shadow

traits.description: Timmy is a brightmage, able to harness the powers of light to purge evil. he approaches any task with an unrivaled fervor that usually places him at the forefront. Being a Brightmage introduces a dependency on the sun and light, because of this, Timmy has developed an intense hatred for shadowy and dark caricatures.
traits.name: brightmage

traits.description: Shamans take a more harmonious approach to arcane powers than most mages, choosing to pursue a path that works with the ebb and flow of magic to offset or enhance the natural order. Timmy is kin to the spirit realm and more attuned to nature and its elements.
traits.name: shaman

traits.description: Golemancers prefer to weave their magic through powerful runes and sigils that are able to transfer purpose into an object. Timmy is no exception; he can create runes that enhance basic mechanics, alter chemicals in biological matter, and animate mundane material into life-like, monstrous creatures. Golemancers are most effective when channeling their magic through symbols and find it more difficult to convert mana to energy directly but are also have higher arcane resistances. Most golemancers tend to find rocks more interesting than people and have little concern for cleanliness.
traits.name: golemancer

traits.description: Timmy is physically adept and has potential to learn special combat forms.
traits.name: physicallyadept

traits.description:
Timmy is a wayfarer; an self-disciplined fighter that excels at tricks and dirty fighting. his carefree personality has kept him from developing class abilities. Instead, he has learned to improve a vast number of utility abilities that allow him to adapt to any situation.

Wayfarers prefer the open road and will gain a mood boost for being in a caravan, and any caravan with a wayfarer will travel 25% faster. However, wayfarers will suffer a mood penalty if they remain at colony for too long.
traits.name: wayfarer

traits.description: Timmy is an apothecary, trained in the preparation of medicines, balms, tinctures and drugs. his profession exhibits strict discipline and dedication, and he has learned to apply his discipline to more generic, physical skills. With training, he can become capable in many combat techniques to augment his skill in herbs.
traits.name: apothecary

traits.description: Timmy has learned how to train the Gladiator combat style.
traits.name: gladiator

traits.description: Timmy is a trained woodsman; preferring the silence and lethality of a bow and armed with field-craft and cunning, he is prepared to defend his land from invaders.
traits.name: woodsman

traits.description: Timmy is a hunter; he employs field-craft, cunning, and skill with a bow to defend his land from invaders.
traits.name: hunter

traits.description: Timmy is a scout; comfortable in the wilds, and relied upon to be the eyes and ears of a colony. he employs expertise in field-craft, cunning, and the bow to defend his land from invaders.
traits.name: scout

traits.description: Timmy is a ranger; master of the wilds.  he is a master of his craft and defender of his land.
traits.name: ranger

traits.description: Timmy has trained to become a sniper, skilled in the economy and accuracy of long range, small arms combat. Training to become a sniper has caused some colonists to be uncomfortable around him, not that he cares.
traits.name: sharpshooter

traits.description: Timmy has trained to become a sniper, skilled in the economy and accuracy of long range, small arms combat. Becoming a sniper has caused him to become distanced from other colonists and somewhat unapproachable, not that he cares.
traits.name: sniper

traits.description: Timmy is a master sniper, skilled in the economy and accuracy of long range, small arms combat. Being a sniper has made him avoid other colonists, not that they care.
traits.name: mastersniper

traits.description: Timmy is a legendary sniper, skilled in the economy and accuracy of long range, small arms combat.  Other colonists avoid eye contact and whisper in corners about how dangerous he is and that suits him just fine.
traits.name: legendarysniper

traits.description: Timmy is training to become a master of the blade and excels at fighting in melee combat.
traits.name: bladesman

traits.description: Timmy has trained to become a sword master, dangerously skilled in melee combat.
traits.name: blademaster

traits.description: Timmy is a blade dancer, highly skilled in melee combat.  Watching him fight is like watching a dance, every action precise and flawless as it flows from one form into another.
traits.name: bladedancer

traits.description: Timmy has become a legend, his skill in melee combat is is known across the world. his skill in combat makes it look as if each movement, each strike, is merely a stitch in a tapestry that depicts his victory.
traits.name: legendarybladedancer

traits.description: Timmy is a master of disguise and imitation; able to manipulate and capture the muscle and mental actions of another and release it as their own.
traits.name: faceless

traits.description:
Timmy is a Psionic - able to manifest mental willpower into raw energy without the use of a psychic amplifier. he is able to project psionic energy but finds it easier and more efficient to apply it as an extension of his body. For this reason, he prefers to be free of encumbering weapons when manifesting psionic energy.

Timmy has become less social since developing psionic powers, preferring to be unhindered by other pawns.

*The regeneration rate of psionic energy is based on psychic sensitivity - reducing sensitivity to 0 will prevent psionic energy from regenerating.
traits.name: psionic

traits.description: Timmy is a Death Knight - harbinger of doom and a representative of the ever approaching inevitability of death and decay. his solemn attitude makes most pawns uneasy and even fewer approve of his methods.
traits.name: deathknight

traits.description: Timmy is a Monk, dedicated to mastering Chi - the energy that connects all life in the universe. he harnesses Chi to create magical effects and exceed his physical capabilities. Timmy is also able to disrupt the Chi in others, affecting their command over spells and abilities.
traits.name: monk

traits.description: As a Commander, Timmy exhibits a charismatic personality and stalwart presence that makes other pawns want to follow his lead. Commander's utilize the weight of their presence to inspire nearby pawns, and when that's not enough, they can issue orders that drive their followers to victory. Because Timmy is used to everyone doing his bidding, he considers menial tasks beneath his status, and is generally a lackluster worker.
traits.name: commander

traits.description: Timmy is a highly trained Soldier, specializing in pistol, shotgun, or rifle weapons. his weapon specialization is augmented by a standard set of combat training. Super Soldiers are trained to be aggressive and consider violence the natural solution to any argument.
traits.name: supersoldier

traits.description: Timmy hates everyone equally.
traits.name: misanthrope

traits.description: Timmy was born without a sense of taste and cannot enjoy food.
traits.name: dysgeuisia

traits.description: Timmy loves to eat food with a variety of ingredients but will be upset over bland food.
traits.name: eclecticpalate

traits.description: Timmy hates violence and wouldn't hurt a fly. They'll get upset if forced to do so.
traits.name: pacifist

traits.description: Timmy suffers from a neurological disorder that makes PAWN_object prone to randomly fall alseep anywhere.
traits.name: narcoleptic

traits.description: Timmy is irrationally afraid of fire and will flee the scene if not drafted. he hates getting burns.
traits.name: pyrophobia

traits.description: Timmy is afraid of the dark. They'll will be extra unhappy when in darkness and has trouble sleeping without light.
traits.name: nyctophobia

traits.description: Timmy loves to sleep in and will gladly ignore their schedule if it means they can lie in bed and sleep some more.
traits.name: sleepyhead

traits.description: Timmy always feels good after a good night's sleep.
traits.name: lovessleeping

traits.description: Timmy was born with a strong, healthy body. They can carry more, mine faster, deal more damage in melee combat and take reduced damage from attacks.
traits.name: strongbody

traits.description: Timmy was unfortunately born with a weak, feeble body. They cannot carry as much as everyone else, mine slower, deal less damage in melee and take increased damage from attacks.
traits.name: weakbody

traits.description: Timmy has no goals in life. No dreams, motivation or passions. It's going to take a lot to break what is left of them.
traits.name: apathetic

traits.description: Timmy has an intense fear of insects and will not hesitate to run away upon spotting one.
traits.name: entomophobia

traits.description: Having had easy access to insect meat during most of their life Timmy became accustomed to eating it to the point that he preferred it over normal meat.
traits.name: entomophagous

traits.description: Timmy loves the company of others. The more, the merrier.
traits.name: gregarious

traits.description: Timmy loves the rain. he doesn't mind being wet and gets happy during rainy weather.
traits.name: pluviophile

traits.description: There's nothing Timmy loves more than snow! No amount of snow is going to slow them down.
traits.name: chionophile

traits.description: It doesn't take much to make Timmy either really excited or to bring his mood completely down.
traits.name: moody

traits.description:
Timmy prefers to wake up early in the day to get as much work done as possible during the day.

he gets a mood boost if awake during the early hours of a day (5h-12h) and mood loss if awake during the evening (17h-0h).
traits.name: earlybird

traits.description: Timmy has grown accustomed to a tightly nit colony and loves sleeping in barracks. Preferably with many other pawns.
traits.name: communal

traits.description: Timmy likes seeing other pawns suffer and gets excited from causing damage.
traits.name: sadist

traits.description: For whatever purpose, Timmy has taught himself every swear word in the dictionary and uses this profane knowledge unconsciously in his day-to-day life.
traits.name: vulgar

traits.description: Timmy always tries to raise their fellow pawns' mood by telling jokes. Or try to, at least.
traits.name: comedian

traits.description: Timmy hates being in confined spaces.
traits.name: claustrophobic

traits.description: Timmy was born without the ability to feel pain. he is unable to experience psychic phenomena as a side effect.
traits.name: congenitalanalgesia

traits.description: Timmy loves guns! Especially shooting them. If he hits or not isn't important.
traits.name: guncrazy

traits.description: Timmy's body works at a faster rate than a normal person, letting them heal faster at the cost of getting hungry quicker.
traits.name: fastmetabolism

traits.description: Timmy's body works at a slower rate than a normal person, healing much slower as a result. At least they don't eat as much.
traits.name: slowmetabolism

traits.description: Timmy just loves the heat and won't suffer any negative thoughts related to being warm. he despises being cold, though.
traits.name: thermophile

traits.description: Timmy just loves the cold and won't suffer any negative thoughts related to being cold. he despises being warm, though.
traits.name: cryophile

traits.description: Timmy is now a natural hunter.
traits.name: naturalhunter

traits.description: Timmy is intrigued by the idea of becoming something other than human.
traits.name: mutationaffinity

traits.description:
Timmy's heart has innocence. Maybe it's because you've never experienced a tough world before.
he will be more traumatized by violent acts such as cannibalism, organ harvesting and sight of dead bodies.
traits.name: innocence

traits.description: Timmy awakened with a new type. he is amazing at dodging, and get +5 points for melee and shooting.
traits.name: newtype

traits.description: Timmy finds it difficult to focus on distant targets, and prefer to get up close and personal.
traits.name: nearsighted

traits.description: Timmy could spot a target from nearly a hundred meters, yet still somehow walk into walls.
traits.name: farsighted

traits.description: Timmy's movements are smooth and graceful.
traits.name: athletic

traits.description: Timmy is so rigid, it's almost like he is souless.
traits.name: stiff

traits.description: Timmy takes care of his personal hygiene.
traits.name: goodhygiene

traits.description: Timmy doesn't care about his hygiene, and sometimes get sick from bad food.
traits.name: poorhygiene

traits.description: Timmy often gets his way with things.
traits.name: persuasive

traits.description: Timmy has never won a debate in his life.
traits.name: unconvincing

traits.description: Timmy has been in plenty of fights since he was a kid, and had built up a tolerance to injury and pain as a result.
traits.name: resilient

traits.description: Timmy lived a pampered life until now, and is unused to the brutal challenges present out in the Rim.
traits.name: fragile

traits.description: Timmy always tackle his tasks with great enthusism.
traits.name: energetic

traits.description: Timmy is slow. Sooo... slooow...
traits.name: sluggish

traits.description: Timmy always sleep like a baby.
traits.name: restful

traits.description: Timmy often has a difficult time falling asleep.
traits.name: restless

traits.description: Timmy is quite productive when it comes to work.
traits.name: efficient

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat of a bottleneck in the colony.
traits.name: inefficient

traits.description: Timmy is brave, he would stand his where others would scramble and run.
traits.name: valiant

traits.description: When there's a fight, Timmy is the first to run.
traits.name: craven

traits.description: Timmy likes a good fight, he will sometimes start a fight just because he can.
traits.name: rowdy

traits.description: Timmy is usually calm and collected.
traits.name: composed

traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in hot environment than his peers.
traits.name: heattolerant

traits.description: Timmy does not like being in the heat.
traits.name: heatintolerant

traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in cold environment than his peers.
traits.name: coldtolerant

traits.description: Timmy does not like being in the cold.
traits.name: coldintolerant

traits.description: Timmy has a well built body, people around he find that rather attractive.
traits.name: muscular

traits.description: Timmy looks a bit fragile, but not in a lovable way.
traits.name: frail

traits.description: Timmy doesn't eat or drink much.
traits.name: abstinent

traits.description: Timmy has a bottomless pit for a stomach.
traits.name: ravenous

traits.description: This is what a common trait would look like when paired with RimTraits: Vanilla Trait Colours.
traits.name: traitdemo:common

traits.description: This is what an uncommon trait would look like when paired with RimTraits: Vanilla Trait Colours.
traits.name: traitdemo:uncommon

traits.description: This is what a rare trait would look like when paired with RimTraits: Vanilla Trait Colours.
traits.name: traitdemo:rare

traits.description: This is what an epic trait would look like when paired with RimTraits: Vanilla Trait Colours.
traits.name: traitdemo:epic

traits.description: This is what a legendary trait would look like when paired with RimTraits: Vanilla Trait Colours.
traits.name: traitdemo:legendary

traits.description: Timmy is naturally talented, he gets a headstart before everyone else.
traits.name: gifted

traits.description: Timmy is someone everyone loves to hate.
traits.name: incompetent

traits.description: Timmy takes great care in the preparation of food, he never skip a step just to have an early meal.
traits.name: patientcook

traits.description: Timmy couldn't care less about following the recipes as long as he can get food into his mouth in record time.
traits.name: impatientcook

traits.description: Timmy lives a healthy lifestyle, and wakes up feeling energetic and cheerful.
traits.name: healthy

traits.description: Timmy gets ill quite often, and seem to require more effort to get out of bed than the average person.
traits.name: chronicallyill

traits.description: Timmy is comfortable in all seasons.
traits.name: temperaturetolerant

traits.description: Timmy thinks that summer is way too hot, and winter is way too cold.
traits.name: temperatureintolerant

traits.description: Timmy has good reaction time and finds physical activities less stressful than his peers.
traits.name: coordinated

traits.description: Timmy is easily distracted and often mess up when it comes to physical activities.
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description: Timmy is what people refer to as a 'stronk boi'.
traits.name: hardy

traits.description: Timmy is so fragile, it doesn't take much to take him out of action.
traits.name: feeble

traits.description: Whether by sheer optimism or a force of personality, Timmy always manages to see the bright side of life.
traits.name: easilyamused

traits.description: Life to Timmy is an endless, boring joke that he just can't get away from.
traits.name: constantlybemused

traits.description: Timmy has an interest in understanding the workings of the world, and is able to apply his knowledge in daily life.
traits.name: inquisitive

traits.description: Gaps in Timmy's education and general lack of curiosity makes life often stressful for him.
traits.name: ignorant

traits.description: Timmy is an aberration, being changed by supernatural forces while still being created to create an advanced being.

data.mod: Beyond the End of the World

traits.name: quantumaberration

traits.description: Timmy is an aberration, being changed by supernatural forces while still being created. Unfortunately, Timmy got the short end of the deal.

data.mod: Beyond the End of the World

traits.name: quantumaberration

traits.description: Timmy is the Maru. They feel the warmth, remind themselves that they are alive, and clear their minds.
traits.name: flameworship

traits.description:
Any object, event, or technology has cause and effect.
Timmy is very skilled at identifying and learning such causal relationships.
traits.name: sharpeye

traits.description:
Timmy's body is naturally flexible.
Stronger and more flexible than others, it has a significant advantage in hunting.
traits.name: flexible

traits.description:
Timmy believes that he is right.
The firm belief has a positive effect on his will, just like his piety, but he also tends to ignore the opinions of others.
traits.name: self-righteousness

traits.description:
A person with strong leadership always influences those around them, either positively or negatively.
No one knows what path such a person will choose or what kind of life he will lead. But one thing is certain, he won't be an ordinary person who comes and goes into the world without anyone knowing. /n/nTimmy was born with that gift.
traits.name: leadership

traits.description:
Timmy has ears that are sensitive to even small sounds.
 Being sensitive to sounds is always an advantage in life outside of its nest, but it also has the disadvantage of not being able to fall asleep deeply.
traits.name: sensitiveears

traits.description:
Timmy is an experimentally cultivated Maru.
It has significantly superior physical abilities than other floors, but its autoimmunity is very low due to its imperfect design.
traits.name: prototype

traits.description: A fragment of a talent to accomplish a feat.
traits.name: inquisitivemind

traits.description: A fragment of a talent to accomplish a feat.
traits.name: senseofduty

traits.description: A fragment of a talent to accomplish a feat.
traits.name: philosophy

traits.description: A fragment of a talent to accomplish a feat.
traits.name: warp

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
races.name: human

races.description: An anthropomorphic feline that likes to live in hot climates. They are known for having abnormal regenerative properties.
races.name: lemolim

races.description: The creation of a twisted bioengineer. A race of skinny humanoids with large heads, violent behavior and an impressive resistence to damage.
races.name: stickman

races.description: Most believe that this is a new stage of human evolution.
races.name: Demonoid

races.description: A race that lives on the ruins of an unknown civilization. Also called Far North or Yeti, they live in a small society over a wide radius.
races.name: Maru
